China:
Song forces conquered and annexed Southern Tang.
Taizu died.
Taizu's brother Emperor Taizong of Song became emperor of the Song dynasty.
The Yuelu Academy was founded.
Germany: Otto the Great established the Margraviate of Austria, a march subordinate to Bavaria on the territory of the former March of Pannonia.
Slovenia: The March of Austria is established. Carantania becomes a duchy in its own right, including Styria and today's East Tirol
